about_me_body:
I am a Fullstack Web Developer with experience in team leadership and fast and efficient creation of solutions. I specialize in improving user experience and development efficiency.

I successfully manage projects from conception to production, fostering a culture of best practices and high technical competence.

With a knowledge in a wide range of technologies, ranging from TypeScript to Go and Rust, I focus on delivering fast and high-quality results, maintaining fluid communication with both clients and international teams.
